item.title: Why Laughter is the Best Medicine: The Science Behind It
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
It’s often been said that laughter is the best medicine, and there’s actually scientific evidence to support this claim. Studies have shown that laughter can have a wide range of positive effects on the body and mind, from reducing stress and anxiety to improving immune function and even relieving pain. Here’s a closer look at...

The post Why Laughter is the Best Medicine: The Science Behind It appeared first on The New Vibes.
